item.title: Hi all, trying a new way of writing posts. still frustrated that I havent gotten images to work yet.
item.description: I am writing this post in an excel sheet, which will turn it into rss code for me. Next I will try and tackle the Mastodon images again...

item.title: Trying out bridgy fed

item.title: Post 1, test post, hello world
item.description: Hey all, there might be a few spam posts while I try to get this stuff to work technologically. I have been thinking a lot about the future of this website and what it will become, and how I will use it to learn coding better... We will see.
